page.title: Bismarck
page.t: This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It has a decent storage area, holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good dreadnaught, almost undestructable, kills even Is without much of a sweat and has the looks of a really beautiful ship in the game, the Asgard. Lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4. I always loved the Terrans and their ships.
This Cannon was designed to burn the whole universe a second time.
An Engine to catch all those kinky rabbits.

This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It has a decent Storage area, holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good fighter, almost undestructable, kills even Frigates without much of a sweat and has the looks of a really beautiful ship in the game, the Gladius. Lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4. Oh, and it is bigger on the inside.
This cannon was designed to allow to counter the Xenon hull regen.
This cannon was designed to allow to counter the Xenon shield regen.
